hadiths.text: It has been narrated on the authority of 'Abdullah b. 'Amr that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:A troop of soldiers who fight in tile way of Allah and get their share of the booty receive in advance two-thirds of their reward in the Hereafter and only one-third will remain (to their credit). If they do not receive any booty, they will get their full reward

chapter.ara-name: باب بَيَانِ قَدْرِ ثَوَابِ مَنْ غَزَا فَغَنِمَ وَمَنْ لَمْ يَغْنَمْ
chapter.eng-name: The reward of those who fought and acquired spoils of war and those who did not acquire spoils of war
